attributes.action: Ban the sale of litters on sites such as Freeads and Gumtree
attributes.additional_details: Too many unwanted cats and dogs in animal sanctuaries. The Government needs to make stricter laws on the sale of these animals on sites where the advertising isn't being monitored
attributes.background: I've seen several adverts from pet owners selling a few litters. There is already an over population of cats and dogs. The Government needs to make these sites stricter when animal sales are involved
